Monetary and banking system: conventional loans and Islamic financing

Source: R/msb.R
msb1_loans.Rd

Monetary and banking system: conventional loans and Islamic financing

Usage

get_sys_loans_appl_purpose(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_appl_sector(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_apprv_purpose(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_apprv_sector(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_disb_purpose(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_disb_sector(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_repay_purpose(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_repay_sector(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_class_type(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_islm_fin_class_type(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_islm_fin_class_concept(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_class_purpose(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_islm_fin_purpose_sector(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_loans_class_sector(year = NULL, type = "commercial")

get_sys_npl_provisions(year = NULL)

get_sys_imp_fin_provisions(year = NULL)

get_sys_imp_fin_provisions(year = NULL)

get_islm_imp_fin_provisions(year = NULL)

get_sys_npl_purpose(year = NULL)

get_sys_npl_sector(year = NULL)

Arguments

year

Scalar integer

type

Banking institution type; one of "commercial" "islamic" "investment" "total"
